name: MICROSCOPIC (Xedith)
description:
MICROSCOPIC is a game where you play as a cell, being overrun by virus cells. Save both you and your human from death by killing the virus cells!

CONTROLS - WASD to move, Left Mouse Button to kill enemies.

==========BUGS==========

On player death 'restart' doesn't work!

Audio on main menu cuts out and comes back.

=========================

For the source of the project: Download the file "MICROSCOPIC_SRC" Warning, big file size!
